title: HoP 316 - Just Measures - Law, Money, and War in Byzantium
itunes:title: HoP 316 - Just Measures - Law, Money, and War in Byzantium
description: Legal and economic thought in Byzantium: the sources of the law’s authority, the relation of church and civil law, just price, and just war.
